name: WannaBeBaby
description:
It is time to prove your strength and determination in this new couch game ! In WannaBeBaby, get in the arena with a couple of your "friends". You won't have time to waste, hit them with everything you can and steal what's left of their lifetime ! But, be carefull, the younger you are, the more powerless you become. At the end of the time, the youngest one win. Who will become immortal ?!

Lead Developer : Alban Manzano

Game Design : Sanchez de Léon Valentin, Manzano Alban, Pamart Pierrick, Laleuf Yann, Guiffard Théo, Yufei Wang

Level Design : Guiffard Théo

Animations and character designer : Sanchez de Léon Valentin

Developer Gameplay : Pamart Pierrick, Laleuf Yann

UI Developer : Wang Yufei
